ai.summary: A short, easy 2.4 km hike in the UK along a gentle, well-marked path. Suitable for beginners, families, and casual walkers seeking a relaxed outdoor experience.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat with a well-maintained trail surface. Expect grass, compact dirt, and gravel in places. Minimal elevation change makes it accessible for most hikers.
ai.safety_notes: Always check the forecast before starting. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a light waterproof layer. Stay on marked paths, watch for uneven surfaces and roots, and avoid narrow ledges or steep edges. Bring water, a small first aid kit, and a charged phone. Let someone know your plans and be mindful of seasonal daylight in the UK. Respect wildlife and leave no trace.
recommended_gear: Lightweight rain shell or warm layer
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and early Autumn are ideal; the trail is shaded in parts and weather is generally milder during these seasons.

seo.title: Beowulf & Grendel Trail — Easy 2.4 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the Beowulf & Grendel Trail, a short 2.4 km easy hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, and gear for a relaxed outdoor experience.
